articles.content: Volvos EX30 crossover has yet to arrive, but it's already generated a lot of interest thanks to a killer combination of a charming design and low starting price of $35,000. On top of that, its eco-fr… [+8620 chars]

articles.title: Hong Kong's Securities Regulator Now Considering Spot Crypto ETFs: Bloomberg - CoinDesk
articles.description: The move comes a month after authorities in the City updated financial regulations to allow for retail investors to buy spot crypto ETFs.
articles.content:
Hong Kongs securities regulator, the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), is moving towards allowing retail investors to buy spot crypto Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs).
